RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the Border Patrol agents: Jorge Luis Trevino and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hugo Benavides: United States Border Patrol Agent who had probable cause to arrest Ignacio Rodriguez upon contact with him
Defendant whose arrest was justified due to sufficient evidence of involvement in drug-smuggling activity
Driver of the white sedan who had been arrested for transporting illegal aliens and had a connection to the registered owner of the black truck
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ: Border Patrol agents involved in the investigation of suspicious vehicles on FM 2050
